subject: Review collaboration
description_text:
In regards to working with you.
Msg context via Ali Express:"Re: "OKï¼ŒLooking forward to working with you[Kiss]"
Hi I'll send a fresh email from jocky3@yahoo.com
and within that a link to my channel.
im very keen to begin discussing review material. Obviously I have your pedals and haptics for now and can do videos on those. id just like to discuss the format and the possibility of reviewing other products also.
when you guys have time. let me know. And please don't feel obligated... you don't owe me anything, and I'll understand if you see me as irrelevant to work with. its a pipedream really, but if the opportunity is there, I'll make sure it's not done half hearted."

My Youtube Channel is linked here
https://youtube.com/@hughesdepagen?si=p62DcbohHxGZo5vp
Kind Regards, Joseph Hughes de Pagen

conversations.body_text: Hi joseph hughes,    Okay, we will submit your information to our manager for review. Thank you for contacting us. We look forward to working with you!
